name: Delakit
description:
"What do you do if you are forced to face your inner demons?" In this Indie horror game, you are placed within yourself and you are forced to face these demons. There may be a way to defeat them, but you must venture within the deepest recesses of your mind to discover how.

This is an indie horror game that is currently in development. It is only in Alpha, but I encourage distribution and gameplay. You may record videos for YouTube with any criticism. The only condition is that you supply a link to the game and proper credits to me.
